attributes.action: Create a public holiday in celebration, recognition and appreciation of Sir David Attenborough and his life's work in promoting a love and respect for our planet Earth.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir David Attenborough a true British hero who has achieved so much in so many ways for the benefit of conservation awareness and the protection of our most precious resource, our fragile eco system, our home. The space here does not allow a full list of his associations and representations, his success, his roles and advisory positions. We all know that his work worldwide should not go unrecognised a true custodian for nature. Vote here to pass forward this idea and join in the celebration of this unique, sincere, talented and well known hero.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
